parameters.name: taskIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the import task.

nested_items.name: graphId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Neptune Analytics graph.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the import task.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: A URL identifying to the location of the data to be imported. This can be an Amazon S3 path, or can point to a Neptune database endpoint or snapshot.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of S3 data to be imported. Valid values are CSV, which identifies the Gremlin CSV format or OPENCYPHER, which identies the openCypher load format.

nested_items.name: parquetType
nested_items.description: The parquet type of the import task.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that will allow access to the data that is to be imported.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the import task:

nested_items.name: importOptions
nested_items.description: Contains options for controlling the import process. For example, if the failOnError key is set to false, the import skips problem data and attempts to continue (whereas if set to true, the default, or if omitted, the import operation halts immediately when an error is encountered.

nested_items.name: s3ExportPath
nested_items.description: The path to an S3 bucket from which to import data.

nested_items.name: s3ExportKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key to use to encrypt data in the S3 bucket where the graph data is exported.

nested_items.name: preserveDefaultVertexLabels
nested_items.description: Neptune Analytics supports label-less vertices and no labels are assigned unless one is explicitly provided. Neptune assigns default labels when none is explicitly provided. When importing the data into Neptune Analytics, the default vertex labels can be omitted by setting preserveDefaultVertexLabels to false. Note that if the vertex only has default labels, and has no other properties or edges, then the vertex will effectively not get imported into Neptune Analytics when preserveDefaultVertexLabels is set to false.

nested_items.name: preserveEdgeIds
nested_items.description: Neptune Analytics currently does not support user defined edge ids. The edge ids are not imported by default. They are imported if preserveEdgeIds is set to true, and ids are stored as properties on the relationships with the property name neptuneEdgeId.

nested_items.name: importTaskDetails
nested_items.description: Contains details about the specified import task.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the import task.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Time at which the import task started.

nested_items.name: timeElapsedSeconds
nested_items.description: Seconds elapsed since the import task started.

nested_items.name: progressPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage progress so far.

nested_items.name: errorCount
nested_items.description: The number of errors encountered so far.

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the errors that have been encountered.

nested_items.name: statementCount
nested_items.description: The number of statements in the import task.

nested_items.name: dictionaryEntryCount
nested_items.description: The number of dictionary entries in the import task.

nested_items.name: attemptNumber
nested_items.description: The number of the current attempts to execute the import task.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the import task has this status value.
